HeaderFooter.description: We provide assistance, love, and solidarity to anyone in need, regardless of their background or circumstances, helping to build a stronger, more inclusive Democratic Republic of Congo.

HomePage.unacoDescription:
founded UNACO (National Unity of Congolese) in 2014 in South Africa to empower
Congolese and African youth. UNACO encourages young people to recognize
their talents and contribute to the development of their communities and
Africa. One significant initiative was a fast against poverty, uniting
975 participants. UNACO continues to inspire youth to actively shape a
better future.
HomePage.learnHowToFulfill: Plenty of events to look forward
HomePage.testimonialsDescription: That means a lot for us
HomePage.faqDescription: Answer your customers possible questions here...

one.title: Our Mission
one.description: At UNACO, we are involved to drive meaningful change by investing in the potential of our youth and fostering collaboration among entrepreneurs. We are committed to creating opportunities that uplift individuals and contribute to the long-term growth of the Democratic Republic of Congo and Africa. Below are the key pillars of our mission:

bullets.title: Youth Advancement:
bullets.desc: Equipping young Congolese with skills and opportunities to drive progress and contribute to national development.

bullets.title: Entrepreneurial Unity
bullets.desc: Bringing together Congolese and African entrepreneurs to collaboratively foster growth in the DRC and Africa.

bullets.title: Future Development
bullets.desc: Shaping a stronger, more prosperous Democratic Republic of Congo through innovation, vision, and collective effort.

two.title: Offer more benefits
two.description: Empowers Congolese and African youth to develop their talents and actively contribute to community-driven growth, while promoting unity to combat poverty and drive social change.

bullets.title: Empowers Youth Talent Development
bullets.desc: Empowers Congolese and African youth to recognize and develop their talents.

bullets.title: Encourages Community-Driven Growth
bullets.desc: Provides a platform for young people to actively contribute to the development of their communities and countries.

bullets.title: Promotes Unity Against Poverty
bullets.desc: Fosters unity and collaboration among young leaders to address poverty and drive social change.

Hero.title: Our Training ðŸ”¥
Hero.desc: In line with our training efforts, each young person is entitled to a personalized interview with a member of our team, who will carefully address your concerns and guide you towards the career path that best suits your aspirations.
